articles.title: Amazon reportedly developing radar-equipped sleep apnea tracker - The Verge
articles.description: Amazon is reportedly developing a new Alexa-powered device that can track sleep and monitor for signs of sleep apnea. The palm-sized device could sit on a bedside table, and use millimeter-wave radar to sense your breathing.
articles.content:
It hopes the Alexa device will monitor for sleep apnea
